remarks: The determinant of a 1-dimensional matrix equals its (single) entry. (Contributed by AV, 6-Aug-2019.)
statement:
mdetdiag.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdetdiag.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mdetdiag.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
m1detdiag $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ ( N = { I } /\ I e. V ) /\ M e. B ) -> ( D ` M ) = ( I M I ) ) $.
